TEXT.TITLE: FUR VAULT <FRV> TO BUY BACK THREE MLN SHARES
TEXT.BODY: The Fur Vault Inc said it will repurchase up to 3,000,000 shares of its common stock. The company has 13,222,873 shares ot common stock issued and outstanding. Reuter
